title: Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen.
description:
Description: Preview attached file in PDF and the page break in the first item didn't happen.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Open attached file in bug 1228982.
OB: When previewing the attached file in PDF format, the page break in the first item is expected to occur.
EB: When previewing the attached file in PDF format, the page break in the first item does not occur.
SR: Preview the attached file in PDF format and verify if the page break in the first item is working as expected.
